Posts.Content: Hey, you're almost there and done! I just finished my first year in remission and I have 4 more years to go with the tamoxifen. It was really scared to think about the doctors being able to keep track of my health, but they run all the tests on time and I go in for the familiar pokes and prods every 2 to 3 months. I just started writing about my "cancer journey" to share some hope with some folks I know are going through this or have kin that are. It's been something to think about for sure. Here's to seeing you through all of this and joining me and others "on the other side."
Posts.Title: Over half-way done
